entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
